title: HW7 Q5: The power of the graph perspective in clustering (Coding)

comments.content: <document version="2.0"><paragraph>Problem context:</paragraph><paragraph>This builds on our goal of bringing your graph understanding back to working memory. The point of this problem is to help you understand that there can be value in thinking about graphs even when your problem might not be natively about graphs. This is also a great way to get you all to remember the spectral perspective on graphs. </paragraph></document>
comments.document:
